title: Actions
content:
A protective shell envelops you. It reflects any projectiles targeted at you back to their point of origin. Requires:Viconia's Walking Fortress Forced Manoeuvre Free Action Increase an ally's movement speed by 50%. They don't provoke Opportunity Attacks. Requires: Martial Adept

Bladesong Climax

Unleash the full damaging and healing effects of your Bladesong at once. Your Bladesong Damage Charges will harm enemies an additional 1d6 Force damage, and your Bladesong Healing Charges will heal you
